speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: ACT III

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: SCENE I. A room in the prison.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before, CLAUDIO, and Provost

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: So then you hope of pardon from Lord Angelo?

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: The miserable have no other medicine

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: But only hope:

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: I've hope to live, and am prepared to die.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Be absolute for death; either death or life

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Shall thereby be the sweeter. Reason thus with life:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: If I do lose thee, I do lose a thing

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That none but fools would keep: a breath thou art,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Servile to all the skyey influences,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That dost this habitation, where thou keep'st,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Hourly afflict: merely, thou art death's fool;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For him thou labour'st by thy flight to shun

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And yet runn'st toward him still. Thou art not noble;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For all the accommodations that thou bear'st

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Are nursed by baseness. Thou'rt by no means valiant;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For thou dost fear the soft and tender fork

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Of a poor worm. Thy best of rest is sleep,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And that thou oft provokest; yet grossly fear'st

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Thy death, which is no more. Thou art not thyself;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For thou exist'st on many a thousand grains

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That issue out of dust. Happy thou art not;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For what thou hast not, still thou strivest to get,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And what thou hast, forget'st. Thou art not certain;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For thy complexion shifts to strange effects,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: After the moon. If thou art rich, thou'rt poor;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For, like an ass whose back with ingots bows,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Thou bear's thy heavy riches but a journey,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And death unloads thee. Friend hast thou none;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For thine own bowels, which do call thee sire,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The mere effusion of thy proper loins,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Do curse the gout, serpigo, and the rheum,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For ending thee no sooner. Thou hast nor youth nor age,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: But, as it were, an after-dinner's sleep,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Dreaming on both; for all thy blessed youth

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Becomes as aged, and doth beg the alms

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Of palsied eld; and when thou art old and rich,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Thou hast neither heat, affection, limb, nor beauty,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To make thy riches pleasant. What's yet in this

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That bears the name of life? Yet in this life

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Lie hid moe thousand deaths: yet death we fear,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That makes these odds all even.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: I humbly thank you.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: To sue to live, I find I seek to die;

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: And, seeking death, find life: let it come on.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: [Within]  What, ho! Peace here; grace and good company!

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Who's there? come in: the wish deserves a welcome.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Dear sir, ere long I'll visit you again.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Most holy sir, I thank you.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Enter ISABELLA

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: My business is a word or two with Claudio.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: And very welcome. Look, signior, here's your sister.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Provost, a word with you.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: As many as you please.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Bring me to hear them speak, where I may be concealed.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exeunt DUKE VINCENTIO and Provost

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Now, sister, what's the comfort?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Why,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: As all comforts are; most good, most good indeed.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Lord Angelo, having affairs to heaven,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Intends you for his swift ambassador,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Where you shall be an everlasting leiger:

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Therefore your best appointment make with speed;

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: To-morrow you set on.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Is there no remedy?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: None, but such remedy as, to save a head,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: To cleave a heart in twain.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: But is there any?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Yes, brother, you may live:

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: There is a devilish mercy in the judge,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: If you'll implore it, that will free your life,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: But fetter you till death.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Perpetual durance?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Ay, just; perpetual durance, a restraint,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Though all the world's vastidity you had,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: To a determined scope.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: But in what nature?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: In such a one as, you consenting to't,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Would bark your honour from that trunk you bear,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: And leave you naked.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Let me know the point.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: O, I do fear thee, Claudio; and I quake,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Lest thou a feverous life shouldst entertain,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: And six or seven winters more respect

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Than a perpetual honour. Darest thou die?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: The sense of death is most in apprehension;

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: And the poor beetle, that we tread upon,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: In corporal sufferance finds a pang as great

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: As when a giant dies.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Why give you me this shame?

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Think you I can a resolution fetch

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: From flowery tenderness? If I must die,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: I will encounter darkness as a bride,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: And hug it in mine arms.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: There spake my brother; there my father's grave

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Did utter forth a voice. Yes, thou must die:

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Thou art too noble to conserve a life

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: In base appliances. This outward-sainted deputy,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Whose settled visage and deliberate word

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Nips youth i' the head and follies doth emmew

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: As falcon doth the fowl, is yet a devil

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: His filth within being cast, he would appear

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: A pond as deep as hell.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: The prenzie Angelo!

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: O, 'tis the cunning livery of hell,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: The damned'st body to invest and cover

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: In prenzie guards! Dost thou think, Claudio?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: If I would yield him my virginity,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Thou mightst be freed.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: O heavens! it cannot be.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Yes, he would give't thee, from this rank offence,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: So to offend him still. This night's the time

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: That I should do what I abhor to name,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Or else thou diest to-morrow.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Thou shalt not do't.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: O, were it but my life,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: I'ld throw it down for your deliverance

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: As frankly as a pin.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Thanks, dear Isabel.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Be ready, Claudio, for your death tomorrow.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Yes. Has he affections in him,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: That thus can make him bite the law by the nose,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: When he would force it? Sure, it is no sin,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Or of the deadly seven, it is the least.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Which is the least?

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: If it were damnable, he being so wise,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Why would he for the momentary trick

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Be perdurably fined? O Isabel!

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: What says my brother?

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Death is a fearful thing.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: And shamed life a hateful.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Ay, but to die, and go we know not where;

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: To lie in cold obstruction and to rot;

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: This sensible warm motion to become

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: A kneaded clod; and the delighted spirit

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: To bathe in fiery floods, or to reside

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: In thrilling region of thick-ribbed ice;

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: To be imprison'd in the viewless winds,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: And blown with restless violence round about

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: The pendent world; or to be worse than worst

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Of those that lawless and incertain thought

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Imagine howling: 'tis too horrible!

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: The weariest and most loathed worldly life

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: That age, ache, penury and imprisonment

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Can lay on nature is a paradise

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: To what we fear of death.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Alas, alas!

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Sweet sister, let me live:

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: What sin you do to save a brother's life,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Nature dispenses with the deed so far

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: That it becomes a virtue.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: O you beast!

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: O faithless coward! O dishonest wretch!

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Wilt thou be made a man out of my vice?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Is't not a kind of incest, to take life

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: From thine own sister's shame? What should I think?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Heaven shield my mother play'd my father fair!

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: For such a warped slip of wilderness

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Ne'er issued from his blood. Take my defiance!

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Die, perish! Might but my bending down

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Reprieve thee from thy fate, it should proceed:

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: I'll pray a thousand prayers for thy death,

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: No word to save thee.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Nay, hear me, Isabel.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: O, fie, fie, fie!

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Thy sin's not accidental, but a trade.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Mercy to thee would prove itself a bawd:

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: 'Tis best thou diest quickly.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: O hear me, Isabella!

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Re-enter DUKE VINCENTIO

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Vouchsafe a word, young sister, but one word.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: What is your will?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Might you dispense with your leisure, I would by and

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: by have some speech with you: the satisfaction I

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: would require is likewise your own benefit.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: I have no superfluous leisure; my stay must be

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: stolen out of other affairs; but I will attend you awhile.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Walks apart

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Son, I have overheard what hath passed between you

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: and your sister. Angelo had never the purpose to

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: corrupt her; only he hath made an essay of her

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: virtue to practise his judgment with the disposition

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: of natures: she, having the truth of honour in her,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: hath made him that gracious denial which he is most

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: glad to receive. I am confessor to Angelo, and I

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: know this to be true; therefore prepare yourself to

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: death: do not satisfy your resolution with hopes

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: that are fallible: tomorrow you must die; go to

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: your knees and make ready.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Let me ask my sister pardon. I am so out of love

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: with life that I will sue to be rid of it.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Hold you there: farewell.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exit CLAUDIO

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Provost, a word with you!

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Re-enter Provost

speaker: Provost
text_entry: What's your will, father

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That now you are come, you will be gone. Leave me

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: awhile with the maid: my mind promises with my

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: habit no loss shall touch her by my company.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: In good time.

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Exit Provost. ISABELLA comes forward

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The hand that hath made you fair hath made you good:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: the goodness that is cheap in beauty makes beauty

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: brief in goodness; but grace, being the soul of

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: your complexion, shall keep the body of it ever

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: fair. The assault that Angelo hath made to you,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: fortune hath conveyed to my understanding; and, but

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: that frailty hath examples for his falling, I should

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: wonder at Angelo. How will you do to content this

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: substitute, and to save your brother?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: I am now going to resolve him: I had rather my

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: brother die by the law than my son should be

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: unlawfully born. But, O, how much is the good duke

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: deceived in Angelo! If ever he return and I can

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: speak to him, I will open my lips in vain, or

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: discover his government.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That shall not be much amiss: Yet, as the matter

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: now stands, he will avoid your accusation; he made

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: trial of you only. Therefore fasten your ear on my

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: advisings: to the love I have in doing good a

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: remedy presents itself. I do make myself believe

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: that you may most uprighteously do a poor wronged

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: lady a merited benefit; redeem your brother from

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: the angry law; do no stain to your own gracious

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: person; and much please the absent duke, if

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: peradventure he shall ever return to have hearing of

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: this business.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Let me hear you speak farther. I have spirit to do

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: anything that appears not foul in the truth of my spirit.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Virtue is bold, and goodness never fearful. Have

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: you not heard speak of Mariana, the sister of

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Frederick the great soldier who miscarried at sea?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: I have heard of the lady, and good words went with her name.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: She should this Angelo have married; was affianced

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: to her by oath, and the nuptial appointed: between

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: which time of the contract and limit of the

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: solemnity, her brother Frederick was wrecked at sea,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: having in that perished vessel the dowry of his

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: sister. But mark how heavily this befell to the

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: poor gentlewoman: there she lost a noble and

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: renowned brother, in his love toward her ever most

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: kind and natural; with him, the portion and sinew of

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: her fortune, her marriage-dowry; with both, her

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: combinate husband, this well-seeming Angelo.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Can this be so? did Angelo so leave her?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Left her in her tears, and dried not one of them

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: with his comfort; swallowed his vows whole,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: pretending in her discoveries of dishonour: in few,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: bestowed her on her own lamentation, which she yet

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: wears for his sake; and he, a marble to her tears,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: is washed with them, but relents not.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: What a merit were it in death to take this poor maid

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: from the world! What corruption in this life, that

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: it will let this man live! But how out of this can she avail?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: It is a rupture that you may easily heal: and the

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: cure of it not only saves your brother, but keeps

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: you from dishonour in doing it.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Show me how, good father.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: This forenamed maid hath yet in her the continuance

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: of her first affection: his unjust unkindness, that

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: in all reason should have quenched her love, hath,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: like an impediment in the current, made it more

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: violent and unruly. Go you to Angelo; answer his

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: requiring with a plausible obedience; agree with

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: his demands to the point; only refer yourself to

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: this advantage, first, that your stay with him may

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: not be long; that the time may have all shadow and

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: silence in it; and the place answer to convenience.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: This being granted in course,--and now follows

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: all,--we shall advise this wronged maid to stead up

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: your appointment, go in your place; if the encounter

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: acknowledge itself hereafter, it may compel him to

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: her recompense: and here, by this, is your brother

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: saved, your honour untainted, the poor Mariana

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: advantaged, and the corrupt deputy scaled. The maid

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: will I frame and make fit for his attempt. If you

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: think well to carry this as you may, the doubleness

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: of the benefit defends the deceit from reproof.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: What think you of it?

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: The image of it gives me content already; and I

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: trust it will grow to a most prosperous perfection.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: It lies much in your holding up. Haste you speedily

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: to Angelo: if for this night he entreat you to his

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: bed, give him promise of satisfaction. I will

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: presently to Saint Luke's: there, at the moated

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: grange, resides this dejected Mariana. At that

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: place call upon me; and dispatch with Angelo, that

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: it may be quickly.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: I thank you for this comfort. Fare you well, good father.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Exeunt severally
